title: CMMC / NIST 800-171 Compliance Tracker
description: A full-stack tool to monitor and manage NIST 800-171 and CMMC compliance, including evidence uploads, control status, and remediation tracking.

title: Threat Intelligence Dashboard
description: Cyber threat monitoring dashboard using JavaScript, Chart.js, and Python APIs to track and visualize threat trends over time.

title: Military Asset Tracker
description: Custom-built logistics tool to manage and visualize tracked assets using secure web interfaces and encrypted backend services.

title: Portfolio Website
description: The site you're viewing now. Designed with HTML, CSS, JS and themed for cybersecurity professionals with modern UI and accessibility in mind.
